member.name: T:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants
member.summary: Constants for Agent subsystem

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_HEADER_CHANGE
member.summary: The topic is used for agent attaching to the Admin Panel, agent registration, agent system settings changing.

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_AGENT_LOAD
member.summary: The Admin Panel uses the topic for agent registration with plugins and attaching registered with plugins agent.

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_CLASSES_LOAD
member.summary: The topic is used for agent registration with/without a plugin, package settings changing.

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_AGENT_NAMESPACES
member.summary: The topic is used for package settings changing (namespaces), agent registration with/without plugins.

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_PLUGIN_ACTION
member.summary: The topic is used to send some action to the plugin(s) (e.g. switch active scope, rename scope, switch scope, delete scope, start a new session, cancel a session, stop a session).

member.name: F:Drill4Net.Agent.Abstract.AgentConstants.TOPIC_TOGGLE_PLUGIN
member.summary: The topic is used for plugins disabling, plugins activating (agent registration, agent attachment, agent toggle, agent system settings changing).
